ai.grakn.graql.internal.reasoner.cache

Class Cache<Q extends ReasonerQuery,T extends Iterable<Answer>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.grakn.graql.internal.reasoner.cache.Cache<Q,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    Q - the type of query that is being cached
    T - the type of answer being cached
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LazyQueryCache, QueryCache

    public abstract class Cache<Q extends ReasonerQuery,T extends Iterable<Answer>>
extends Object

    Generic container class for storing performed query resolutions.

    Author:
    Kasper Piskorski

        vars - variable names of interest
        Returns:
        inverse answer map for specified query
